name.en: Health and Safety for Young Children

description:
1. 具備幼兒健康照顧及健康促進之基本知能
2. 瞭解幼兒可能發生的事故傷害及其預防與照護
3. 瞭解幼兒意外事件發生時的緊急處理原則
4. 學習幼兒急救之知識與技能
5. 了解教保人員於維護幼兒健康與安全發展中所扮演的角色
6. 具備幼兒健康及安全教育的教學能力

syllabus.zh:
1. 幼兒健康照護與及健康促進相關內容, 包含:
(1) 幼兒飲食與營養
(2) 幼兒健康生活促進
(3) 幼兒常見疾病及預防
(4) 正確用藥
(5) 幼兒身體活動
(6) 幼兒心理健康促進…等。
2. 幼兒可能發生的事故傷害及其預防與照護, 包含:
(1) 居家安全
(2) 交通安全
(3) 戶外安全
(4) 人身安全
(5) 食品安全…等。
3. 幼兒急救的知識與技能，包含:
(1) 急救概論
(2) 幼兒呼吸道異物梗塞時的急救
(3) 幼兒心肺復甦術
4. 實施幼兒健康及安全宣導活動,提升學生健康教育及安全教育的教學
能力
syllabus.en:
1. Related contents of child health care and health promotion, including:

(1) Diet and nutrition of young children.
(2) Life health promotion for young children.
(3) Common diseases and prevention of young children.
(4) Medication.
(5) Physical activity for infants and young children.
(6) Promoting mental health of young children ... etc.
2. Injuries and prevention and care of young children, including:
(1) Home safety.

(2) Traffic safety.
(3) Outdoor safety.
(4) Personal safety.
(5) Food safety ... etc.
3. Knowledge and skills of first aid for young children, including:
(1) Introduction to First Aid.
(2) Hamrick First Aid.
(3) Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR).
4. Implementing health and safety promotion activities for young children to
improve the teaching ability of students in health and safety education.
